name: Whatever You Can't Not Do
description:
A short Twine story about an unconventional protest and a long-distance relationship. Written for #resistjam. I highly recommend that you click the fullscreen button above, and that you use headphones.

Edited to remove names of real people. Drop me a tweet if you'd like the un-Bowlderized version.

Story by Ed Sibley @thing_stuff

Music by Katt Strike @KattStrike
